distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for dovecot22 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-11500: Fixed a potential remote code execution in the IMAP and ManageSieve protocol parsers (bsc#1145559).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In Dovecot before 2.2.36.4 and 2.3.x before 2.3.7.2 (and Pigeonhole before 0.5.7.2), protocol processing can fail for quoted strings. This occurs because '\0' characters are mishandled, and can lead to out-of-bounds writes and remote code execution.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
